text: Novy Mir () is a rural locality (a village) in Kabakushsky Selsoviet, Sterlibashevsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 28 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 24 km from Sterlibashevo, 1 km from Kabakush. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlibashevsky District
title: Novy Mir, Sterlibashevsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
